alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 2:53AM EST until January 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Seneca, Northern Oneida, Cortland, Onondaga, Tompkins, Steuben, Yates, Schuyler and Southern Cayuga counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Falling temperatures through the day combined with light snow on top of a light glaze could produce icy roads in some locations, especially secondary roads. Use extra caution if traveling today. Also, persistent lake effect snow showers will produce additional light snow amounts into tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cortland; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates
